keyEvents.title: Punk Hazard's Tragic Past Revealed
keyEvents.description: The island's history is revealed - it was once lush and green before being destroyed by a chemical weapons experiment four years ago.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the dark past of the location and its importance to the arc's story.

keyEvents.title: Caesar's True Crime Revealed
keyEvents.description: Smoker reveals that Caesar Clown was responsible for the explosion that destroyed the island.
keyEvents.significance: Connects the location's destruction to the arc's main antagonist.

historicalSignificance.description: Four years before the current timeline, a chemical weapons experiment went catastrophically wrong, destroying the island and releasing poisonous gas.

currentStatus: Abandoned (officially), secretly occupied by Caesar Clown

reveals.information: Punk Hazard was destroyed four years ago by Caesar Clown's chemical weapons experiment
The island is inhabited by prisoners who were paralyzed by the poisonous gas and saved by Caesar
